t: How expired food still ends up on Amazon and what's being done to stop it
s: March 7, 2020 - Amazon is shipping out food products that are expired, stale, or tampered with. Four months after CNBC first reported the problem, a new analysis found the sellers are still shipping expired food, even as regulation begins to catch up.
